title: Noam Chomsky on alternatives to state capitalism
description:
Go to 'Occupy Wall Street News and Videos' here: http://paper.li/f-1319837259 -- a daily paper to keep up with and support OWS movement!

Please feel free to share any news or videos with other people to help continue getting the word/information out. That's what it's there for!

Thanks! -Munderlarkst (Note: if you subscribe to 'Occupy Wall Street News and Videos' it will send you and new edition once a day via e-mail so you can keep updated with what's going on. Thanks!) 

Above video: Noam Chomsky advocating working class popular presses, self-management and democratic control of institutions, and ending wage labor -- "these are all perfectly feasible alternatives...there's no economic or political theory that tells us there's anything wrong with them...and you can move towards realizing them."
